channel.title: Help me please when i type ::bank look what happens :(
channel.description:
look what happens when i type ::bank :(
[code][client-1-[gm]mont]: playerCommand: bank java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -4 at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at java.lang.String.substring(Unknown Source) at client.customCommand(client.java:12597) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:22494) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16948) at client.process(client.java:16920) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:97) awesomepk[fatal] - exception[/code]
Please help me someone :(

item.title: Help me please when i type ::bank look what happens :(
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

fixed it thanks

item.title: Help me please when i type ::bank look what happens :(
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

at client.customCommand(client.java:12597)

at client.customCommand that’s the method … then … client.java line 12597 … so go into your client.java and hit ctrl + g and type in 12597 and fix it.

Read full topic
